column1: '''2 Yule''' was the first day in the [[Shire Calendar]]
column2: marking the beginning of the year.<ref>{{App|Shire}}</ref> On a modern calendar
column3: it would approximately correspond to 22 December.  Due to the [[Shire-reform]] the Yuledays always fell on the same days of the week.  2 Yule was always a [[Sterday]] (Saturday).<ref>{{App|Calendars}}</ref>
